Navigation
Name ErrorMessages/InvalidDateTimeComparison
Synopsis Attempt to compare a date with a time.
Description Rascal:DateTime values may contain two components: date and time. Datetime values that contain both a date and a time can be compared. Dates can also be compared with dates, and times with times. This error is generated when a date is compared with a time.
Examples Some problems with parsing dates here Comparing dates with dates: 
rascal>$2013-07-15 < $2014-07-15
bool: true
Or times with times: 
rascal>$T09:15 < $T09:00;
               ^ Parse error here
